document.topic_text: Employment Special Education Paraprofessional St. Clair Public School is looking for multiple special education paraprofessionals for the 2016-2017 school year. Please apply online at http://www.stclair.new.rschooltoday.com or send resume to Dustin Bosshart; PO Box 99; St. Clair, MN 56080-0099 Industry:
